Package view

Interface IVisualisointi

All Known Implementing Classes:
Visualisointi, Visualisointi2, VisualisointiNaytto1, VisualisointiNaytto2
public interface IVisualisointi
The IVisualisointi interface defines the methods that a visualization for the simulator should implement. It provides methods for clearing the display, managing service points, displaying simulation time and error messages, and getting the GraphicsContext object.
